subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: R. J. Hunter’s 3-point shot with 2.6 seconds remaining sent his father, Georgia State’s coach, tumbling from his chair as the No. 14-seeded Panthers eliminated No. 3-seeded Baylor on a wild first day.
snippet: R. J. Hunter’s 3-point shot with 2.6 seconds remaining sent his father, Georgia State’s coach, tumbling from his chair as the No. 14-seeded Panthers eliminated No. 3-seeded Baylor on a wild first day.
